tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive company information including size, industry, financial data, and technology stack for firmographic analysis.

company_identifier.description: Company name, domain, or stock ticker symbol

data_fields.description: Specific company data fields to retrieve

include_subsidiaries.description: Whether to include subsidiary company data

data_freshness.description: Required data recency: current, recent, or any

geographic_scope.description: Geographic focus: global, domestic, or regional

error_messages: Company not found: Unable to locate company with provided identifier.
Invalid data fields: Requested fields are not available or incorrectly named.
Data access restricted: Some requested company data requires higher permission level.
Invalid data freshness option: Use one of [current, recent, any].
Invalid geographic scope: Use one of [global, domestic, regional].
usage: Provide company_identifier and specify data_fields array with desired information types. Set include_subsidiaries, data_freshness, and geographic_scope based on analysis needs.

company_data.description: Comprehensive company information as JSON string

data_completeness.description: Percentage of requested fields successfully retrieved (0-100)

last_updated.description: Timestamp of when company data was last updated

subsidiary_count.description: Number of subsidiaries included in data (if requested)
